prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: Promptbook is described as feeling "like magic" by a Frontend Developer, allowing for immediate creation of working apps from plain English descriptions.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Promptbook, Frontend Developer, magic, creation, working apps, plain English descriptions
